name: anomalous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
different from what is usual, or not in agreement with something else and therefore not satisfactory: In a multicultural society is it not anomalous to have a blasphemy law that only protects one religious faith? The experiment yielded anomalous results. See
anomaly
More examplesFewer examplesYou can't account in advance for anomalous events that could ruin your plans, like weather.Events of the past few weeks are making our deal increasingly anomalous.Temporary staff are in an anomalous position.
